thread.title: Upstate NY dentist charged in man's fatal poisoning in '11
thread.title_full: Upstate NY dentist charged in man's fatal poisoning in '11 - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Upstate NY dentist charged in man's fatal poisoning in '11
text:
KINGSTON, N.Y. (AP) - A Hudson Valley dentist is scheduled to be arraigned on murder charges in what authorities say was the fatal poisoning of a 44-year-old man four years ago.
The Daily Freeman of Kingston reports ( http://bit.ly/1G9flqz ) 48-year-old Gilberto Nunez of Poughkeepsie is expected to be arraigned Friday morning in Ulster County Court in Kingston on charges of second-degree murder.
Authorities say the charges stem from the November 2011 death of Thomas Kolman, a married father of four from nearby Saugerties (SAW'-ger-teez). Officials say Nunez forced Kolman to ingest a substance that caused his death.
Authorities haven't identified the substance or publicly discussed a possible motive. They say Kolman was poisoned at a shopping plaza in the town of Ulster, outside Kingston, where Nunez's practice is located.
Nunez's attorney, Gerald Shargel, said his client didn't cause Kolman's death.
Information from: Daily Freeman, http://www.dailyfreeman.com/
